none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 10, 2017 Description from Terminal Escape:
People try really hard to be this weird. This dark. This pure. This real. But Minnesota's LIFE DRAG aren't trying.....they are just trying to be. Morose and monotone noise rock dissected and dismantled, dragged back to its most primitive and sinister state. Get loose. Let go.  FEEL YOUR GRAVE

seo.title: Life Drag - Feel Your Grave - Terminal Escape
